::KitKat::

She glared at Psuedo and  Atma. "Will all of you stop this petty 
bickering.  We have other things to worry about.  Get the wounded 
fixed up.  We then need to find another base and get ourselves 
organized.  Then we need to get revenge on the Maximals for all they 
have done to us.  If you survive to that point, then you can fight 
amongst yourselves, not until then!"  She winced at the pain in her 
leg.  She noticed she was standing in a pool of fluid already.  She 
reached out and took Drillbit's shoulder to stabilize herself. "And 
now if you will pardon me, I need to get fixed up."  She then limpoed 
to the CR room.  She sat in a chair next to the chamber to catch her 
breath.  She grimaced in pain as it surged through her.

> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, RoboRick007 <rfa007@h...> wrote:
> > ::DrillBit::
> >

> > "Kit doesn't even know she ever new a Land Mine or a Time Bomb. 
The
